name: Social-feed-server
description: A server proxy for requests to social networks from Social-feed

HEROKU_URL.description: The URL of this Heroku app.

FACEBOOK_TOKEN.description: Place here your facebook app access_token

GOOGLE_TOKEN.description: Place here your google app access_token

INSTAGRAM_CLIENT_ID.description: Place here your instagram application client_id

CORS_URL.description: The url from which requests are sent in a browser
